play time
10 minutes to 60 minutes

item.title: Liquidum
item.description:
About This Game



Dive into Liquidum, a water-themed picross puzzle game that challenges your strategic thinking and puzzle-solving skills. Progress through six distinct sections, each introducing new challenges and mechanics to keep you on your toes.

Diverse Challenges and Mechanics:

Experience a unique twist on the classic picross puzzle, where you strategically fill interconnected aquariums with flowing water. Encounter a variety of puzzle elements, including hidden hints, boats that float above the water, and diagonal walls within cells, adding depth and variety to each puzzle. These mechanics are progressively introduced throughout the game's 48 campaign levels.

Daily Levels with Unique Themes:

Enjoy a daily dose of fun with unique themed levels each weekday, and leaderboards to compare your results with your friends and the community.

Explorer Mode with Procedurally Generated Levels:

Embark on an endless adventure in Explorer Mode, featuring procedurally generated levels with customizable difficulty. Every level offers a fresh and unique puzzle experience.

Level Editor and Steam Workshop Support:

Unleash your creativity with the level editor, crafting your own puzzles to challenge yourself and others. Share your creations on Steam Workshop, where players can explore and enjoy user-generated content.

item.title: Meteorite Z: The Apocalypse
item.description:
About This Game

Are you ready for the ultimate zombie apocalypse? Do you have what it takes to survive the hordes of the undead? Then get ready for the most hardcore top-down zombie shooter ever!

In this game, you will face endless waves of zombies, each more vicious and hungry than the last. You will have to use your skills, tactics, and reflexes to stay alive and fight your way to the exit. Zombies do not feel tired, they have an excellent sense of smell, speed and rage.

You have a huge arsenal of weapons at your disposal for survival, from axes and machetes to flamethrowers and rocket launchers.
You can slash, burn, and explode your enemies, and also fight back in a fist fight.
Many types of weapons, each with its own unique features.

You are not alone. You have allies, who will help you in your mission. But there is a catch. One bite, and your ally will turn into a zombie.
Do you shoot him right away, or let him bite you?

item.title: Geometry Survivor
item.description:
About This Game

Geometry Survivor is a rogue-lite auto shooter where you must survive for 20 minutes. Fight against waves of geometry ships, defeat their formations and survive the grid world.

Features

  • One hand gameplay: Use just one hand to control the direction of your ship
  • Auto-Shooter: Your weapons fire automatically, letting you concentrate on staying alive
  • Weapons: Each run allows you to get a unique combination of weapons
  • Credits: Earn credits and permanently unlock new upgrades
  • Enemies: Enjoy the multitude of enemies each with their own AI
  • 20 minutes of intense gameplay
  • Retro visuals and music straight from the 80s
  • Delicious gameplay!



Geometry Survivor is the ultimate survival game, do not miss it!!

item.title: Penny’s Big Breakaway
item.description:
About This Game

Ready. Set. YO! - Join Penny & Yo-Yo in a kinetic 3D-platformer bursting with innovative gameplay! Showcase your catalog of tricks and chain impressive combos to deliver Penny & Yo-Yo's perfect breakout performance. Take the stage with this vibrant pair in Penny’s Big Breakaway.

Penny is a street performer with big dreams; she has her own spin on what it takes to be a star! When Eddie the Emperor calls for new Palace Court Performers, Penny gets herself tangled in an audition she’ll never forget. A strange encounter with a Cosmic String transforms Penny’s Yo-Yo into a living creature with an appetite for snacks— and mayhem! Use Yo-Yo to help Penny clear her name, outrun the Emperor’s penguin army, and unravel the mystery of the Cosmic String.

Burst onto the scene in the fluorescent world of Macaroon, home to this over-and-under escape! Discover your true star power in this easy-to-play, difficult-to-master challenge. Penny’s Big Breakaway is the debut title from Evening Star.



Key Features:

Walk the Dog: Yo-Yo’s big appetite will earn an even bigger reward with snack power-ups! Use these tasty treats to temporarily transform Yo-Yo, granting it the abilities to improve movement speed, protect Penny from harm, and much more!



Around the World: Flee from Eddie the Emperor’s massive penguin army as they chase you clear across the planet! These clumsy flightless birds patrol the halls, come bursting through walls, and will stop at nothing to seize you! Help out friendly denizens along the way and make use of your spectacular surroundings to evade your capturers.



Encore Stage: Play your way with multiple game modes! Show off your skills as you chain awesome combos and rack up multipliers in Story Mode. Take on the ultimate speedrunning challenge and dominate the leaderboard in Time Attack Mode. Redeem coins for bonus items, secret stages, and more unlockable extras.

item.title: Getting Canceled
item.description:
About This Game

You have finally gotten a job, despite your useless degree.

Now it is time to do what you can to make a good impression on your new co-workers and boss!

Getting Canceled is a visual novel where the choices made by the player will influence the outcome of the story.

You play the game as the protagonist called John, who is just an average guy with no memorable features or personality traits.

John starts working at the marketing department of a mid-size soft beverage company, alongside a set of teammates with slightly more distinctive personalities.

The will of the boss sometimes clashes with the team. On top of that your teammates disagree with each other constantly.

Whose side will you be on?

item.title: G.O.P.O.T.A 2
item.description:
About This Game

One day in the cold winter I went out of the entrance.... And came in again.



This is a unique game that will immerse you in the exciting world of street brawls, youth parties and computer clubs. You will have to take on the role of a real gopnik, who stands on the protection of his neighborhood from hostile gangs and scoundrels.

Starting with a small showdown, you will gradually find yourself in the center of the universe of the criminal world. Defend your honor and your neighborhood in street fights, win in fights with dangerous opponents.

But not everything is so bad! You will have the opportunity to visit the computer club, where you can gather with your friends and plan your next actions. Also you will be waiting for exciting hangouts with clear guys, with whom you can relax after a hard day.

Features

.
  • Winter map of your favorite neighborhood
  • There is a stall with tasty foam
nearby.
  • You can visit a cool computer club
.
  • Socializing with the cool kids from the neighborhood
.
  • Kid soundtrack
  • Lifelike graphics
  • And more!

item.title: Human Factory
item.description:
About This Game

You are a great tentacled cosmic deity, drifting through the endless void. Space can be very boring at times. But every now and then you find something that can hold your attention. This time, you found Earth.

Build your Human Factory.

Build a habitat, populate it with Humans and then butcher them into many parts for profit. Keep them fed and happy and they will work for you to craft items and power your machines. Automate everything with Pipes, Conveyors and Wall Flippers.



Raise and Breed your Humans.

Breed or clone Humans and separate them by Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Charisma. Complete quests for other great cosmic space deities and unlock new technologies. Expand your factory line to get the most out of each and every Human.



Butcher Humans and sell their Souls.

Process and export the Human parts for profit. Make clothes from their Hair and Skin, make drugs from their Hearts and Livers, make sausages from their flesh and Intestines, put their brains in a jar and sell their dreams for eternity, bottle and sell pure joy and pure horror, breed and sell high quality Humans whole. Question the very nature of morality and Human existence. Automate everything.

item.title: Culture Warz: Chess
item.description:
About This Game

This chess-based game adds a layer of strategy and depth, while the meme-tastic visuals and over-the-top animations keep the tone light and playful.
Whether you're a left-wing or a right-wing memer, there's something in Culture Warz Chess to tickle your funny bone and maybe even make you think twice about the state of online discourse.
Local multiplayer allows players to battle it out in person.

Key Features;
  • Play 3d Chess with Zombies and Chads.
  • Change your camera perspective from top-down to 3d to view all angles of the board.
  • View close-ups of pieces getting taken with epic animations.
  • Play against 3 difficulties of AI
  • Play local Co-Op.

But Culture Warz Chess isn't just about quirky pieces and witty banter. It's a thought-provoking and strategic experience that throws you into the heart of today's most polarizing debates.

item.title: Slave Zero X
item.description:
About This Game



From the top of Megacity S1-9, the Sovereign Khan rules with fists of iron and flesh. Beneath the city’s rotting foundations, a vengeful warrior embarks on a journey to murder him. 4 years prior to the events of Slave Zero, Slave Zero X brings new life to a world where horrific, living machines known as Slaves are primed to become the latest tools of war in humanity’s long and bloody history. A secret band of warriors known as The Guardians hope to stop these biomecha from being unleashed upon the world, but one swordsman among their ranks has a different idea: use the enemy’s own weapon against them. By merging with a stolen Slave Unit Prototype, Shou will become a furious Devil in pursuit of killing a false God.




KILLER COMBOS: Use swift swordplay, explosive ordnance, and stylish combos against an army of meat and metal.


DEATH FROM ABOVE: Air juggling, dashes, and frequent target switching allow for you to take down foes of any size while wall-jumping and platforming can help you outmaneuver your enemies.



FIGHT FOR YOUR LIFE: Conquer mini-bosses, set pieces, and climactic 1-on-1 encounters that offer intense challenges against unforgettable villains.



STRENGTH IS NOTHING WITHOUT CONTROL: Use the Training Room to hone precise and powerful moves to string together devastating attack sequences.



BATTLE TO THE BEAT: A 90s-inspired soundtrack features heavy Drum’n’Bass and funky industrial music that adds to the thrill of combat.


FEAST YOUR EYES: A unique visual aesthetic combines nostalgic 2D sprites with an advanced lighting system and stylized 3D environments.

THE END IS NEVER THE END: After completing the campaign, further challenges await in an expansive and frenetic ‘Crimson Citadel’ procedural challenge tower with an online high score leaderboard.

item.title: Demons and Doobins
item.description:
About This Game

Demons and Doobins is a multiplayer game meant for some cheap fun with friends.

You spawn in as either a doobin or a demon. Doobins work together to complete objectives giving them the ability to blast the Demon to smithereens. The Demon lurks around trying to kill the Doobins. There are a few unique abilities, tools, and mechanics that add spice to this simple cat-and-mouse gameplay loop.

Doobin
As a Doobin you and your compadres work together to complete tasks. Each task inches you closer to acquiring a hand cannon. While working towards finishing your tasks, you have a few tools to help yourself survive the demon that lurks among the shadows. These tools include hiding in crates, tossing a hot potato at the demon, blinding the demon with flour, and throwing a boot that makes footstep sounds.

Demon
As a Demon, you also have a few tricks up your sleeves. Find and utilize an invisibility potion, shoes with wheels, a kitchen knife, a radar gun, and a teleportation orb. If all else fails, the Demon can hide in the shadows and pounce when Doobins are near.

How to Play
This game utilizes game codes and Steam lobbies, so it's extremely easy for anyone on Steam to load up with friends and immediately jump into a friendly match. While the game can be started with one player, at least 2 players are required to have at least one Demon and Doobin.

item.title: Windah Horror Adventure 2
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a spine-chilling journey with "Windah Horror Adventure 2", a top-down 3D rage game that pushes your limits and survival instincts. Assume the role of Windah Basudara or any of her companions from the formidable Jaya Esport group, including Mic, Rio, Cendy, Rizad, and Fandi. Each character boasts unique skills that you must strategically leverage to overcome the numerous obstacles and challenges in each level.

Dive into a world where Indonesian folklore Ghosts reign, presenting formidable foes in epic boss battles. The game seamlessly blends horror and adventure as you navigate through terrifying environments, confronting mythical entities from Indonesian lore. Can you summon the courage and skill to face these supernatural adversaries and emerge victorious?

Windah Horror Adventure 2 offers a compelling narrative and gripping gameplay, ensuring that each level is a test of both wit and reflexes. Uncover the mysteries, conquer the obstacles, and utilize character-specific abilities to navigate treacherous terrains. The relentless challenge invites you to ask yourself, can you conquer the horrors that await in this ominous realm?

As you progress, collect anime treasures scattered throughout the levels to unlock special rewards and unique character skins. The game's rich storyline and diverse characters, combined with its challenging gameplay, promise an immersive and unforgettable experience for horror and adventure enthusiasts alike. Brace yourself for an adrenaline-pumping journey into the unknown.

item.title: Void Islands
item.description:
About This Game

Are you a prey or predator, a world where magic moves you through the islands of void.

Collect the Finish counter, then when magic is disabled; find the exit lamp to move you to the next island.

A 3d platformer of a small inhabitant of the void island, who is able to transcend to other floating void islands.
Dodge enemies and complete the levels as a passifist animal, but other void creatures are not the same and may attack or defend themselves.

Fully utilised movement to best fit the simplicity of the game, sometimes you will be saved if you accidently fall off, or haven't got your bearings correct.

Full Controller support for Xbox Controller and Steam Deck.

48 Islands to explore, C++ Beach Engine 1.0.

Works on SteamOS and Windows.

item.title: Hook Adventure
item.description:
About This Game


Welcome to the world of exciting adventures on flying islands! Get ready to immerse yourself in an exciting story, where exciting quests, mysterious NPC characters, amazing hook mechanics, exciting locations and abstruse puzzles await you.

You will find yourself in an amazing world where islands float in the air like small fairy islands among the clouds. Each island has its own unique atmosphere, characteristic features and opportunities for exploration. Uncover their secrets, learn how to maneuver between them and open the way to the most hidden treasures.

Surrounded by majestic views and colorful landscapes, you will find yourself in the center of an impressive story with beautifully crafted characters. Meet mysterious NPCs who will help you solve the mysteries of each island and complete challenging quests. But be careful - not all the characters will turn out to be your friends, and you will have to reveal their secrets to move forward.

The magic mechanics of the hook can give you height and freedom. With it, you can fly in the air, reach inaccessible places, explore the most intricate caves and solve complex puzzles. Your skills and skill in controlling the hook will be the key to success in this exciting and dangerous adventure.

Travel through stunning locations where each island will surprise you with its diversity and splendor. Mountain peaks covered with greenery, smoothly turning into moonscapes and blooming fields among the clouds - each island is created with a love of detail and beauty to make you freeze with admiration.

But don't forget about the riddles and puzzles that will stand in your way. Solve them, use your hook and your wits to overcome difficulties and reach the final goal. You will be constantly forced to think logically, be creative and observant - the only way you can uncover all the secrets and achieve victory.

Take off on the flying islands and embark on an unforgettable adventure full of amazing mechanics, beautiful locations and exciting puzzles. The world of flying islands is waiting for you to discover its secrets and embrace your skill and courage. Get ready for an exciting adventure that will leave unforgettable impressions for a lifetime!

item.title: BeaureCard
item.description:
About This Game

Beaurecard

A path to the underworld has been opened and demons are roaming the lands of BeaureCard. Can you defeat the demon lord and save the world?

Gather powerful cards, strategically build your deck, and prepare to face the ultimate test of skill and strategy: an epic showdown against the demon lord. Will you be victorious or succumb to the perils that lie ahead? The fate of BeaureCard rests in your hands.

The game

Your deck is your health in BeaureCard! Prepare for quick and fast paced battles. Strive to deplete your opponents' deck, cleverly using traps, powers, blessings, and curses. In this true deckbuilder, you can freely add or remove cards to customize your deck and adapt to any situation. Embark on an epic adventure, with exciting events to explore, new cards to acquire, and dangerous demons.


Features

  • Your deck is your health!
  • Use traps that activate on deplete.
  • Use blessings and curses that can counter each other.
  • Freely add and remove cards from your deck.
  • 3 unique characters with different play styles; even one where you draw from your opponent's deck!
  • Many unique events: Gamble, shop or travel mysterious roads. And maybe you will find a treasure? What risks are you willing to take to build the ultimate deck?
  • Short runs: an average run takes ~10-30 min.
  • 100+ different cards.

item.title: PiM World
item.description:
About This Game

In the game you will lead your settlement. You will have to build various buildings starting with a castle and ending with an institute. Every decision you make should be balanced, because the economy of your settlement is growing, and the lack of resources can catch up instantly! Other settlements are not dormant, they are also developing and have their own unique behavior.
In the game you will meet with various events that can help your settlement as well as harm it! Try to keep your settlement well stocked so that there are fewer and fewer of these events.
Laboratories will help your settlement to discover new types of warriors, which are many times stronger than the usual ones. To start a war with another settlement, you need to click on the enemy's lock and select the corresponding button.

Controls:
WASD - Camera Control
CTRL + Mouse Wheel - Control Zoom
Right mouse button - Build/Select

Features:
- pleasant and simple graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;

item.title: Just Get There
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an exhilarating tower-climbing puzzle platformer adventure enjoying the sheer satisfaction of reaching greater heights through boundless creativity. Challenge your wits and dexterity as you navigate diverse levels featuring an array of characters.

Explore different environments, from medieval castles perched on mysterious islands to towering skyscrapers reaching the clouds. Every level presents distinct challenges, encouraging you to adapt your strategy and conquer the heights in creative ways.

Engage in Adventure Mode, where you can leisurely explore intricate levels, uncover secret spots, and master the art of stacking objects to ascend to new heights. Alternatively, face the ticking clock in Time Pressure levels, where rising water or lava adds urgency to your quest. Will you climb swiftly and triumph, or succumb to the relentless tide?

Dive into Sandbox levels for limitless creativity, with an ever-expanding array of objects to stack into gravity-defying towers. Procedural levels offer dynamic challenges, pushing your skills to the limit with increasingly difficult towers that demand precision and quick thinking.

Can you balance risk and reward to reach the pinnacle without toppling your towering constructions?

Welcome to a world where the sky is the limit, and your ingenuity is the key to success. Will you rise to the challenge and construct your path to greatness, or will you fall from the heights you so bravely attained? The journey is yours to climb in this exhilarating puzzle platformer!

item.title: Re into Another World
item.description:
About This Game

"Re into Another World" is an RPG adventure game set in a fantasy world. Players need to accumulate souls by constantly challenging monsters, using these souls to unlock more powerful characters in order to defeat the final demon. The game includes elements of character growth and upgrades, equipment combinations, and puzzle-solving.
Each adventurer has only one life, with death taking nothing with them.
The only inheritance is the "soul," and the secret of the "soul" awaits discovery by one adventurer after another. You need to unravel the secrets of this world as much as possible before your life runs out.

item.title: Cogstellation
item.description:
About This Game

Cogstellation is a space mining game based entirely around connecting gears. Improve your ship to be the space travel machine that you know it can be, and upgrade your base and equipment in an endless cycle until the solar system has been fully conquered, and beyond!

fight to the death and complete challenges to unlock the next planet, by doing so you will gain access to even better equipment, and a whole new base for your utilization with each planet.

once you are done with that, continue exploring the vast endless emptiness that awaits you beyond pluto's orbit, and see how far you can get.

join our discord community aswell to get help with the game and leave feedback.

item.title: Recon Quest
item.description:
About This Game



To complete your objectives you will control one of four custom vehicles. Each vehicle is suited to a specific task so you'll need to be sure to pick the right one. You'll need all the advantages you can get to defeat the enemy vehicles, buildings and bosses that stand in your way.

Vehicles

  • Tank
    Built to destroy other vehicles, the tank is quick and agile.
    Primary Weapon: Anti-vehicle cannon
    Secondary Weapon: Projectile shield

  • Drone
    Incredibly fast, the drone is good at sniffing out those hard to find objectives.
    Primary Weapon: Dash
    Secondary Weapon: Places teleport beacons for the siege vehicle

  • Siege
    Ponderously slow and inept at destroying vehicles, the siege vehicle is hell on wheels when it comes to taking down turrets and walls.
    Primary Weapon: Teleport to beacon
    Secondary Weapon: Deploy to artillery mode

  • Builder
    Can construct all manner of helpful buildings, such as the mini-tank factory and turrets.
    Primary Weapon: Build Building
    Secondary Weapon: Place Landmine

item.title: THE JUSOU 3
item.description:
About This Game

■ The Ultimate Horror Escape Game "THE JUSOU -The Beginning Chapter-"


THE JUSOU Series, which gained fame as the scariest horror escape game in smartphone history, now proudly debuts on Steam!!

Why was that cursed nest born...
A story tracing back even further, 25 years to its very origins.

Exploration inside the school is done using a 3D map!
Brace yourself and advance through the corridors swirling with terror!

With the scariest production ever, we deliver a heart-pounding, chilling fear that will stay with you.
※This game contains horror and frightening scenes, as well as grotesque depictions of blood, which may be traumatizing.
※Please play this game at your own risk. We are not responsible for any phenomena that occur as a result of playing.

■■ THE JUSOU -The Beginning Chapter- Prologue ■■

I had an older sister, three years my senior.
In the summer of her senior year of high school, just before graduation, she jumped off the school's rooftop.

Why did she have to commit suicide, why did she have to end her life?

I still can't accept the fact that my kind sister killed herself.

A year has passed...
I enrolled in the same school as my sister.

Students have been mysteriously disappearing from this school for several years.

These inexplicable events started in 1965, the year my sister enrolled.

There is something about this school.
A dark, murky truth...

A letter found in my shoe box a few days ago.

"The truth you seek... in classroom 1-4 at 22:00.”

The truth about my sister's death begins to unravel today...

■■■■

Fear is contagious...

item.title: Dark Gravity
item.description:
About This Game



Shoot, destroy, collect, craft and destroy even more! "Dark Gravity" is a fast-paced, low poly vertical shoot'em up game that features non-linear campaign mode with lots of enemies and bosses. Craft new weapons, upgrade your fighter and build an ultimate aerial war machine!


After the fifth world war, there was peace in the world. For over a decade, the Grand Alliance has been leading humanity towards a better tomorrow by stifling all dangers in the bud. For some time, however, there is suspicion of a new threat that cannot be ignored.

As a member of SAF forces, your mission is to take over the Shielton base, captured by unknown rebels. No one knows who they are and what they want. What's worse, even IMC forces couldn't drive them away from the base because of their advanced weaponry. Weaponry out of this world. But... are those rebels the main threat? Isn't there anything bigger behind all this? No time for questions! You must stop them at all costs!


Gameplay mechanics are very simple - destroy all enemies and try to avoid every bullet... well, at least those which can be avoided. Your special maneuver allows you to dodge normal projectiles. Even if you get hit, you will only lose one extra weapon! However, watch out for powerful bosses! They can thorn you into pieces with their ultimate unavoidable attacks!


The story mode can be completed in a few various ways. Military operations are carried out on several fronts simultaneously. It's up to you which path you will choose. From battles high in the sky, through military bases, underground factories, collapsed mines and abandoned laboratories, to secret Arctic research facilities and the interiors of unknown civilization artifacts - you must go through all of this several times to accomplish all missions.


Every difficulty level is different. Improving your skills and fighter will help you out at facing hard and insane mode bosses, as they don't appear at easier levels. Enemy's layouts will change as well as their shooting patterns. At higher difficulties, you will also meet enemies that you have not met before.


Collecting drop parts and blueprints throughout the missions will allow you to unlock and craft new fighters, weapons, and upgrades. However, remember that only playing at the highest levels of difficulty will allow you to achieve a pinnacle of technology. Uncover the crafting tree and develop unique power-ups!

item.title: Invisible Fear
item.description:
About This Game

This is my first game as a solo developer, of course you may encounter some bugs that I will be fixing! Since my childhood it was my dream to create my own game and here it is. I put a lot of time and effort into this game, I hope you enjoy it!

Evelynn, an ordinary teacher in a private school, who had to endure tragic events, after that the school was closed and she was hospitalized with a serious injury. Now the previous nightmare follows her, haunts her dreams and calls her to go back, so Evelynn decides to return to the school to find out what happened on that terrible day. She wants to end her painful memories. There she encounters something supernatural...

Abandoned School

- Go through the nightmare in an abandoned school and find out what happened on the tragic day that changed everything here.

Camera is the key to survive

- Use your camera or security cameras to protect yourself from creatures that comes out at night. The cameras can show you some invisible things.

Survive the night

- In order to survive the night you need to find a certain number of artifacts. Each night will become more difficult and the creatures more dangerous.

Replayability

- The items spawn is set randomly, as is the creatures on the location. You'll never be sure what awaits you in the next room: artifact or a trap?

item.title: Idle Fields
item.description:
About This Game



What is Idle Fields?

Idle Fields is a relaxing Idle game where you grow crops, fish, cook, decorate your house, take care of animals, and complete everything possible by leveling up skills and unlocking rewards. Level up Farming, Husbandry, Fishing, Cooking, Woodcutting, and Constrution.





This game offers you:


  • 50 levels in 6 different skills
  • Workers to automate skills
  • Many achievements with more to come
  • A relaxing atmosphere
